name: RunWithZombies
description:
盡所能地不要被殭屍追上，收集15個大蒜即可勝利

被殭屍碰到減一個符咒，符咒歸零或掉落即遊戲結束

利用道具來取得優勢

說明：

上: 跳躍
下:下跳
左:射擊(需要有子彈)
右:衝刺(需要有油)

Keep Running for surviving and collect 15 garlic to win.

If get caught by  those zombie, you will lost a Taoist magic figure.  And you lost all  Taoist magic figure or falling off the platform, game will be over.

Use items to keep zombies away.

Intrustions:

UpArrowKey: Jump

DownArrowKey: Jump Down

LeftArrowKey: Shoot ( Need bullet.)

RightArrowKey: HyperRun ( Need oil.)

Taoist magic figure can get extra life.
